title: The Realities of recycling
creator_credit: Stuart Finley and United States. Environmental Protection Agency
brief_description: Recycling our solid wastes is basic to the protection of our environment. It is the most important single principle which must be incorporated into tomorrow’s solid waste management systems to permit conservation of our resources and easy and economical solid waste disposal. Designed for leaders and technicians who need a more comprehensive grasp of the potential of recycling. Various forms of recycling systems are shown.
